title: Muscle relaxant and antipyretic effects of pentacyclic triterpenes isolated from the roots of Diospyros lotus L.

Publication date: Available online 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon

Author(s): Ajmal Khan, Hamdy Kashtoh, Abdur Rauf, Sobia Ahsan Halim, Awan A. Aleem, Haji Bahadur, Huma Shareef, Fazal Mabood, Asaad Khalid, Kwang-Hyun Baek, Ahmed Al-Harrasi
